TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted, you break the piano.

i wish for a box that i am not trapped in.

granted, you break the piano.

i wish for a box that i am not trapped in.

Granted. But everyone is yelling at you to get off it.

I wish Auburn will beat Bama in football for the rest of eternity (thats American Football, not soccer)

granted. your are a permanent player for Alabama.

i wish for a sequel to operation return to sender.

Granted. You're flagged up as a Nigerian citizen and deported. Nigeria in turn considers you an American citizen and deports you back, and so on. You spend the rest of your life being ping-ponged between the intransigent bureaucracies of both countries.

I wish I won a hundred thousand pounds.

granted. your are a permanent player for Alabama.

i wish for a sequel to operation return to sender.

fine by me. Im an auburn fan so if I had to lose I want it to be with my fan. (only thing is I'm a student at Auburn, how am I playing for bama)

Granted. But game locks up each time you try to play it.

(in all seriousness I do want to make a sequel but I'm still in a rough part of life right now.)

I wish my depression would end

Granted. You're flagged up as a Nigerian citizen and deported. Nigeria in turn considers you an American citizen and deports you back, and so on. You spend the rest of your life being ping-ponged between the intransigent bureaucracies of both countries.

I wish I won a hundred thousand pounds.

granted, you weigh 100,000 pounds

i wish i was dumb.

granted, you weigh 100,000 pounds

i wish i was dumb.

granted. No corruption needed.

I wish I could go fishing today.

Granted. But the only thing you catch is bird flu.

I wish Squid wouldn't be so slow.

Granted. ALL HERE NOW BEAR WITNESS TO THE INCURSION OF CTHULHU INTO OUR MORTAL PLANE.

I wish people would stop summoning Cthulhu already. >.>

Granted, we summon Uhluhtc instead.

I wish I had good internet access everywhere!

Granted, we summon Uhluhtc instead.

I wish I had good internet access everywhere!

Granted but it is good by AT&T and Internet Exploers standards

I wish people would just get along
I wish you live atleast until your 45 year.

Umm, granted. You, however, do not.

I wish people would read the rules.

Granted, but they don't follow them.

I wish for a little kitty cat.

Edited November 17, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff
Added question. DUH!

Granted. It's incredibly hostile.

I wish that schools stopped treating mud the way they do. Mud can be an exercise tool, true story, if it's thick enough!

Granted, but not really.

I wish kids at my high school weren't so stupid.

Granted, but not really.

I wish kids at my high school weren't so stupid.

Granted. IQ level increases by 1

I wish I had a million bucks

Granted, a million male deer invade your home.

I wish I was rich.

Granted. You are richer by 1 Cuban peso.

I wish hsiw I

Granted detnarg. Yes, your legal name is now detnarg. You may not change it.

I wish I had a time turner. And a spare PC.

granted, a million male deer invade your home.

I wish i was rich.

hahaahahahahaha

i knew some one would do that.

Lucky for me im a deer hunter.

Wish corruption fail!!!!

hahaahahahahaha

i knew some one would do that.

Lucky for me im a deer hunter.

Wish corruption fail!!!!

Granted. A million armed, organized and belligerent male deer invade your home. How much ammo do you keep on hand?

I wish for more ammo.

Granted. A million armed, organized and belligerent male deer invade your home. How much ammo do you keep on hand?

I wish for more ammo.

HAhaaha that wasn't a wish.

I wish for more ammo.

More ammo for the deer army it is!

I wish for an effective deer repellent, just in case.

Edited November 18, 2014 by Overfloater
added "effective".

Granted. The deer repellent also repels people and doesn't wash off, leaving you a lonely hermit with only your gigantic SSTOs for company.

I wish the world wasn't balkanized.
